MTW_AncestorSpirits.AncestorMemoDef.label: disquiet
MTW_AncestorSpirits.AncestorMemoDef.letterText: Your Ancestors are unhappy. An undefinable malaise settles over your colonists.

MTW_AncestorSpirits.AncestorMemoDef.label: bedevil
MTW_AncestorSpirits.AncestorMemoDef.letterText: Your Ancestors are unhappy. They have chosen to bedvil {0} as an example to the rest of your colony.

MTW_AncestorSpirits.AncestorMemoDef.label: hearten
MTW_AncestorSpirits.AncestorMemoDef.letterText: Your Ancestors are pleased. You colonists can feel this, and will step easier in the coming days.

MTW_AncestorSpirits.AncestorMemoDef.label: encourage
MTW_AncestorSpirits.AncestorMemoDef.letterText: Your Ancestors are pleased. They have chosen to encourage {0} as an example to the rest of your colony.

MTW_AncestorSpirits.AncestorMemoDef.label: single crop blight
MTW_AncestorSpirits.AncestorMemoDef.letterText: Your Ancestors are displeased. As a demonstration of their displeasure, they have chosen to blight your {0} crop.
